headline: PPG Industries Unveils Sustainable Fire Coating As Shares Show Strong Momentum
summary: PPG Industries (NYSE:PPG) has introduced PPG STEELGUARD 652, a water-based intumescent fire protection coating for structural steelwork. The product carries UL 263 certification and is designed to offer durable fire protection with low VOC emissions. The new coating targets construction projects that require both safety performance and more sustainable material choices.
